Friendship Matching Party
22  February,  2024
Friendship matching party between 8 members from Al Hidaya special Needs school and 5 members from London international school and 3 volunteers from Qatar Academy
.
Best buddies' friendship program is hosting in art event with collaboration with arts and crafts center
